SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: El a√±o pasado la m√©dica denunci√≥ que a los estadounidenses se les estaba negando una posible cura para el Covid-19 luego de que entidades como la Administraci√≥n de Drogas y Alimentos de los Estados Unidos (FDA por sus siglas en ingl√©s) y el principal experto epidemi√≥logo de la Casa Blanca, Anthony Fauci, desvirtuaron la efectividad de la hidroxicloroquina.
SEG.TRANSLATED_TEXT: Last year, the doctor reported that Americans were being denied a possible cure for Covid-19 after entities such as the United States Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and the White House's leading epidemiologist, Anthony Fauci, distorted the effectiveness of hydroxychloroquine.

SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: Este virus tiene una cura, se llama hidroxicloroquina, he tratado a m√°s de 350 pacientes y no he tenido una muerte", afirm√≥ immanuel junto a varios miembros del grupo denominado American Front Line Doctors.
SEG.TRANSLATED_TEXT: This virus has a cure, it's called hydroxychloroquine, I've treated over 350 patients and I haven't had a death, "he said with several members of the American Front Line Doctors.

SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: La m√©dica titulada de la Universidad de Calabar en Nigeria, exigi√≥ una disculpa por parte de medios como CNN, CNBC y el New York Times, tras censurar la informaci√≥n que ofreci√≥ sobre el medicamento durante una cumbre de m√©dicos en Washington D.C. y calificarla como ‚Äòloca de Hollywood‚Äô.
SEG.TRANSLATED_TEXT: The doctor from Calabar University in Nigeria demanded an apology from media outlets such as CNN, CNBC and the New York Times, after censoring the information she offered about the drug during a medical summit in Washington D.C. and calling her "Hollywood crazy."

SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: "[Exijo disculpas] de toda esa gente que se sent√≥ a hacer v√≠deos llam√°ndome loca cuando dije que la hidroxicloroquina funciona y que no debemos permitir que la gente muera", se√±al√≥ la m√©dica.
SEG.TRANSLATED_TEXT: "[I apologize] to all those people who sat around making videos calling me crazy when I said that hydroxychloroquine works and that we shouldn't let people die," the doctor said.

SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: "Me refiero a la FDA, al CDC, al NIH, me refiero a todos ustedes.
SEG.TRANSLATED_TEXT: I mean the FDA, the CDC, the NIH, I mean all of you.

SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: Mis colegas, los que me insultaron, los que amenazaron con denunciarme a la junta y todo eso, porque dije que la hidroxicloroquina funciona", agreg√≥.
SEG.TRANSLATED_TEXT: My colleagues, those who insulted me, those who threatened to report me to the board and all that, because I said the hydroxychloroquine works, "he added.

SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: "Ahora tienes todos estos estudios que dicen que funciona.

SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: ", se√±al√≥ Immanuel, quien agreg√≥ luego: "Alguien necesita que su trasero sea demandado tan mal que no encuentren una salida de donde est√°n encerrados".
SEG.TRANSLATED_TEXT: , "noted Immanuel, who later added:" Someone needs their ass to be sued so badly that they can't find a way out of where they're locked................

SEG.TRANSLATED_TEXT: The doctor also referred to current President Joe Biden: "Even Joe Biden called me crazy," he said.

SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: "Exijo una disculpa de todos y cada uno de ustedes".

SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: Recientemente la prestigiosa revista m√©dica The Lancet, ofreci√≥ disculpas por una edici√≥n que fue emitida el a√±o pasado en la cual dieron su respaldo a un estudio que afirm√≥ que la hidroxicloroquina era ineficaz como f√°rmaco para tratar el Covid-19.
SEG.TRANSLATED_TEXT: Recently, the prestigious medical journal The Lancet apologized for an issue issued last year in which they backed a study that claimed that hydroxychloroquine was ineffective as a drug to treat Covid-19.

SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: De acuerdo con National File, la decisi√≥n de la revista m√©dica obedeci√≥ a que Surgisphere Corporation, la compa√±√≠a que proporcion√≥ datos, se neg√≥ a brindar acceso completo a la informaci√≥n en la que bas√≥ su estudio.
SEG.TRANSLATED_TEXT: According to National File, the medical journal's decision was that the Surgisphere Corporation, the company that provided the data, refused to provide full access to the information on which its study was based.

SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: Seg√∫n argumentaron, la decisi√≥n de Surgisphere Corporation se debi√≥ a que aparentemente se violar√≠an los acuerdos con los clientes y con los requisitos de confidencialidad, generando dudas sobre el estudio.
SEG.TRANSLATED_TEXT: They argued that the Surgisphere Corporation's decision was based on the apparent violation of customer agreements and confidentiality requirements, raising doubts about the study.

SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: "Sobre la base de este desarrollo, ya no podemos garantizar la veracidad de las fuentes de datos primarias.
SEG.TRANSLATED_TEXT: Based on this development, we can no longer guarantee the accuracy of the primary data sources.

SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: Debido a este desafortunado desarrollo, los autores solicitan que se retire el art√≠culo", se√±al√≥ The Lancet en un comunicado.
SEG.TRANSLATED_TEXT: Because of this unfortunate development, the authors request that the article be withdrawn, "The Lancet noted in a statement.

SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: De acuerdo con un nuevo estudio publicado por Hackensack Meridian Health, una red de proveedores de atenci√≥n m√©dica en Nueva Jersey, un grupo de personas con s√≠ntomas leves de Covid-19 se pueden beneficiar del tratamiento con Hidroxicloroquina.
SEG.TRANSLATED_TEXT: According to a new study published by Hackensack Meridian Health, a network of health care providers in New Jersey, a group of people with mild symptoms of Covid-19 can benefit from Hydrochloroquine treatment.
